channel.title: CVE Feed for nvidia -- NVIDIA Triton Inference Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for nvidia -- NVIDIA Triton Inference Server

item.title: CVE-2024-0087|2024-06-04T17:58:57.239Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20triton%20inference%20server
item.description: NVIDIA Triton Inference Server for Linux contains a vulnerability where a user can set the logging location to an arbitrary file. If this file exists, logs are appended to the file. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to code execution, denial of service, escalation of privileges, information disclosure, and data tampering.

item.title: CVE-2024-0100|2024-05-09T21:51:36.086Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20triton%20inference%20server
item.description: NVIDIA Triton Inference Server for Linux contains a vulnerability in the tracing API, where a user can corrupt system files. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to denial of service and data tampering.

item.title: CVE-2024-0088|2024-06-04T17:58:35.426Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20triton%20inference%20server
item.description: NVIDIA Triton Inference Server for Linux contains a vulnerability in shared memory APIs, where a user can cause an improper memory access issue by a network API. A successful exploit of this vulnerability might lead to denial of service and data tampering.
